text_body: Our recommendation is to not overthink your ratings as this
will increase the burden of the task. Sometimes it is better to
respond somewhat instinctively. Having said this, it will be
possible to replay each pair as many times as possible before
submitting your judgement but it will not be possible to return
to a certain pair once it has been rated.
Over the following screens you will perform a series of practice
comparisons. Please rate sounds as you would in the actual
experiment and use these trials to familiarise yourself with the
When you click Continue you will hear the first pair of
sounds. Ensure you are comfortable, and please proceed when you are
